channel.title: Thoughts on Classic
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Classic

item.title: Most Universal tool of man
item.description: Wheel yes, wheel One of the Man’s greatest invention of all time. Our very basic movement will somehow have wheel in our life. It has been our day-to-day essential one for work. Let us go back to man’s early history. At first man tame animals for his use. The first animal to be tamed was the dog. It watch and warned the master approcaching danger Man soon discovered that pack of dogs could pull a fairly heavy load.

item.title: What makes me happy
item.description: What make me happy?? Sridhar: I want my life to be full of great moments Also me: Great moments exists inside the ordinary moments. continues to enjoy the moment
